subject: Redesign layout presets with more complex options
body:
- Reduce basic layouts to 3 essentials (Full Bleed, Top/Bottom, Left/Right)
- Add golden ratio splits (62/38) for professional proportions
- Add L-shape layouts in all 4 directions for multi-cell grids
- Add T-layout and Inverted-T for header/footer emphasis
- Add asymmetric layouts: Mosaic, Four Rows, Sidebar+Stack, Header+2x2
- Update categories: Basic, Split, Grid, Asymmetric
- Total 28 layouts with proper aspect ratio filtering
title: Redesign layout presets with more complex options
